title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.41 - Announcers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.41 - Announcers

State Regulations

The promoter shall engage an announcer for each contest or
exhibition, who shall be approved in advance by the Commission. The promoter
may be held responsible by the Commission for the actions or omissions of their
announcer. Notes

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
